sense.gloss: cord used to tuck up the sleeves of a kimono
sash (worn over the shoulder to the opposite hip)
obi (strip of paper looped around a book, CD, etc. containing information about the product)

k_ele.e: 帯に短したすきに長し

r_ele.r: おびにみじかしたすきにながし

sense.gloss: neither one thing nor the other, too short for a belt, too long for a sleeve tie
tucking up the sleeves of a kimono with a tasuki

sdata.j: ↑帯↑↓おび↓に↑短↑↓みじか↓し、↑襷↑↓たすき↓に↑長↑↓なが↓し。
sdata.e: Too much spoils, too little is nothing.
